person.persName: Edward R. Weir, Jr. (Muhlenburg co attorney)

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Edward R. Weir, Sr., and Harriet R. Weir. Merchant in Muhlenberg County, in 1860. Captain in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from December 9, 1861, to December 9, 1863. Lieutenant Colonel of the 35th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from May 28, 1863, to December 29, 1864.
